modName: Perfect Legionnaire- Imperial armor reforged - French
summary:
Traduction francaise du mod Perfect Legionnaire- Imperial armor reforged de Ali Bengali

Ce mod remplace l\'armure de troupe impériale par celle de style Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
Perfect Legionnaire - Imperial Armor Reforged
By: Ali Bengali
Translated : Fr0stX

Traduction du mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6085]Perfect Legionnaire- Imperial armor reforged[/url]

Ce mod remplace l\'armure de troupe impériale par celle de style Morrowind.

Note: N\'utiliser qu\'un seul fichier a la fois.
Note2: Compatible NNM

Dans cette version:

2 choix de couleur:
-Bleue
-Rouge

Détails:
-Remplacement de l\'armure lourde impériale
-Remplacement du bouclier impérial
-Retravaillement de l\'armure légère impériale
-Retravaillement du casque impérial
-Retravaillement des bottes impériale

Pour plus de détail, référer au mod original: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6085]Perfect Legionnaire- Imperial armor reforged[/url]

Crédits:
Original author: Ali Bengali
Thanks to Aremeta\'s for her very good Imperial Legion Armor mod.
Thanks to morpheas768 who provided a cool and convenient NMM Installer for the whole package. *Down for now for package rearrangements*
Thanks to Davis237834 who authorized usage of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4099]Roman Style Imperial Legion Shields[/url]
Thanks to Bethesda for this awesome game and the Creation Kit.

Legal and Usage
This traduction was done with written autorisation from original author.  

DO NOT use in any compilation without original author permission!
DO NOT use these textures and meshes in your own mod without original author permission!
DO NOT use this mod as a part of any other mod without original author permission!
author: Ali Bengali
